price: Dan sungguh jika kamu tanyakan kepada mereka, "Siapakah yang menciptakan langit dan bumi?", niscaya mereka akan menjawab, "Semuanya diciptakan oleh Yang Maha Perkasa lagi Maha Mengetahui".
arabic: وَلَئِن سَأَلۡتَهُم مَّنۡ خَلَقَ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضَ لَيَقُولُنَّ خَلَقَهُنَّ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wala-in sa-altahum man khalaqa al-samāwāti wal-arḍa layaqūlunna khalaqahunna al-ʿazīzu al-ʿalīmu
